main event: An object was observed in Morgantown, North Carolina on February 3, 1965, which did not correspond with any known satellite or meteorological explanation.
interesting points: The object was observed multiple times over a 30-minute period.,The object had fading colors and one large bright object.,A gold color was noted in the object during the observation.,The letter responding to inquiries about UFOs indicates that explanations often involve conventional objects and natural phenomena.,The inquiry about the sighting was responded to with a request for detailed descriptions of the event.
sighted object: a large bright object with fading colors
